title: Artificial Intelligence-Based Chatbot for Electrical Appliance Control
description: This project presents an artificial intelligence-based chatbot for controlling electrical home appliances using ESP8266-12E NodeMCU and Facebook Messenger platform.

title: Student Management System
description: This project is dynamic and interactive single-page web application developed using Angular and TypeScript.It streamlines the management of student data.
